name: Monster Mop Up
storyline: The Ministry of Monster Concealment needs you! Adorable little Ragamuffins are crossing over to the human world and are wreaking havoc. Grab your mop, your high-tech trap,a pair of trusted gloves, and set out to clean their mess, leaving no trace behind. Whether you are cleaning at a leisurely pace, or actively seeking out the Ragamuffins, you’ll discover new and funny ways of cleaning messes in this simulation, sandbox. casual game! Fulfill your Ragamuffin Retrieval requests by providing a home to those little creatures - with dozens of customization options nonetheless!
summary: Grab your mop, your high-tech trap, a pair of trusty gloves, and get ready for Monster Mop Up! Rescue adorable little Ragamuffins, clean their mess, and build their home. Your relentless efforts to keep our existence concealed from humans are greatly appreciated by the Ministry of Monster Concealment
